amendment.description: To provide for a study on increasing the effectiveness of existing services and programs intended to benefit children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2115 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2115 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4827, S4828, S4831; text: CR S4828) To provide for a study on increasing the effectiveness of existing services and programs intended to benefit children.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2115 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2115 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2089.
